text: Les Monts-Ronds is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2022 and consists of the former communes of Mérey-sous-Montrond (the seat) and Villers- sous-Montrond.Arrêté préfectoral, p. 39, 22 December 2021 == References == Category:2022 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Les Monts-Ronds
